title: Jazz Age Lawn Party Brings Back The 1920s
more_content: Approaching its 12th year, the Jazz Age Lawn Party is a summer tradition celebrated on Governor's Island. This 20s themed event encourage attendees to wear their best outfits, try classic cocktails and dance to live jazz! Listed as New York Times' most memorable event of the year, please check their official website for more information on ticket pricing and more.
short_description: The Jazz Age Lawn Party 2017 brings back the roaring 20s this summer on Governor’s Island. Join thousands of 1920s fanatics from all over to enjoy food, dancing and entertainment by Michael Arenella and his band, Dreamland Orchestra, at this prohibition era inspired event.
seo_description: Bring your snazzy dancing shoes and celebrate the 1920s at the Jazz Age Lawn Party
